text:
In my head, the best way to explain @NMDOH prioritizing #NewMexicans 60+ w/ chronic conditions for a #COVID19 #vaccine is with a lottery drawing analogy - but my graphics could only provide buckets of ice cubes.🤦‍♀️

I present - Tessa's Vaccine Explainer Ice Bucket Challenge 🧊💉 https://t.co/LDgRUlkuU5
